amendment.description: An amendment numbered 19 printed in Part B of House Report 118-30 to strike Section 20103, which requires the Secretary of Interior to resolve any protest to a lease sale within 60 days.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A019) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Grijalva.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A019) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
